What does personal accident insurance cover? Click video for more details!
(January 2021)

Double Indemnity for Accidental Death
You can choose among 4 different plan levels that cover Accidental Death and Permanent Disablement Benefit up to HK$2,000,000, which helps ease your financial burden in the event of an unfortunate accident. If accidental death occurs when riding as a fare paying passenger on board a public conveyance licensed to carry passengers, the indemnity will be doubled up to HK$4,000,000
Daily Hospital Income Benefit up to HK$900 Per Day
If hospitalisation is required due to an accidental injury, you will receive cash allowance up to HK$900 per day during your stay in the hospital, which compensates for temporarily income loss during hospitalisation
Enrol together with your Spouse to Enjoy 10% Premium Discount!
